skills.name: meta-agentic-chunking
skills.description: Breaking complex tasks into discrete sub-steps with isolated context for maximum precision.

skills.name: meta-context-budgeting
skills.description: Techniques for managing the context window limit in long-running AI agents.

skills.name: meta-mcp-dynamic-tools
skills.description: Using the Model Context Protocol to dynamically manage agent capabilities and context.

skills.name: meta-recursive-discovery
skills.description: Enabling agents to autonomously search for and adopt new specialized skills.

skills.name: meta-skill-importer
skills.description: Automated workflows for importing and adapting external skills from third-party repositories (e.g., Google Gemini Skills) into your local library.

skills.name: meta-skill-routing
skills.description: Strategies for dynamic skill discovery to minimize context overhead.

skills.name: skill-author
skills.description: Comprehensive guide and automation for creating, maintaining, and packaging AI skills within the skills library. Use when adding new skills or updating existing ones to ensure they meet repository standards and are correctly packaged for distribution.

skills.name: template-skill
skills.description: A template skill demonstrating the required structure and metadata for a skill package.

description: Advanced strategies for managing large skill ecosystems and context.
